topics.title: Topics
topics.subtitle: Browse news by topic. Each story is automatically categorized using AI analysis.
topics.how_topics_desc: Our AI analyzes each article to identify relevant topics. Articles can have multiple topics associated with them. Topic classification helps you find related coverage and understand how different stories connect.

topic_descriptions.politics: Government, elections, policy decisions, and political developments
topic_descriptions.economy: Economic indicators, inflation, trade, and fiscal policy
topic_descriptions.business: Corporate news, startups, markets, and industry updates
topic_descriptions.cricket: Sri Lanka cricket team, domestic leagues, and international matches
topic_descriptions.sports: Football, rugby, athletics, and other sporting events
topic_descriptions.tourism: Travel, hospitality, tourist arrivals, and destinations
topic_descriptions.education: Schools, universities, examinations, and educational policy
topic_descriptions.health: Healthcare, medical news, public health, and wellness
topic_descriptions.crime: Law enforcement, court cases, and crime reports
topic_descriptions.environment: Climate, wildlife, conservation, and environmental issues
topic_descriptions.technology: Tech industry, digital transformation, and innovation
topic_descriptions.international: Global affairs, diplomacy, and foreign relations
topic_descriptions.entertainment: Movies, music, TV, celebrities, and cultural events

blindspots.title: Blindspot
blindspots.subtitle: Stories with coverage gaps
blindspots.what_are_desc: Blindspots are stories that are disproportionately covered by one side of the political spectrum. These stories may be underreported by left-leaning or right-leaning sources, giving you an incomplete picture. Understanding blindspots helps you see what you might be missing.
blindspots.no_blindspots_desc: All current stories have coverage from across the political spectrum.
blindspots.newsletter_desc: Get weekly blindspot updates delivered to your inbox

briefing.no_briefing_desc: Check back later for today's news briefing.
